net.jordaria.debug

Class DebugConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • net.jordaria.debug.DebugConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener, Listener

    public class DebugConsole
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements Listener
    A console for showing processes and events that occur in the program. What is shown is configurable.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DebugConsole()
      Constructs a new debug console and sets up components.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Adds the message to the last line of the window and removes the top line if it exceeds the maximum line count.
      void onDebugMessage(DebugMessage event)
      Appends the events message to the text area.
      void onEntityMoveRequest(EntityMoveRequest event)
      If moving events are set to display, appends a message informing of the movement and direction.
      void onEventSystemStarted(EventSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void onGraphicsSystemStarted(GraphicsSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void onPhysicsSystemStarted(PhysicsSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.
      void onShutdown(ShuttingDown event)
      Removes all components, hides the frame, and removes the reference to the frame for garbage collection to clear out.
      void onSoundSystemStarted(SoundSystemStarted event)
      If starting systems are set to display, appends a message informing of the startup.

        windowActivated, windowClosed, windowClosing, windowDeactivated, windowDeiconified, windowGainedFocus, windowIconified, windowLostFocus, windowOpened, windowStateChanged

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
